languages.text: {n}Взгляд седого слуги исполнен свирепого возмущения, пылкого, как разведенный фанатиком палаческий костер.{/n}
{n}The grey-haired servant's eyes burn with vicious indignation, like an executioner's pyre lit by a fanatic.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляд седого слуги исполнен свирепого возмущения, пылкого, как разведенный фанатиком палаческий костер.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那位灰发仆人的双眼中燃烧着恶毒的愤恨，仿佛狂热分子点燃的火葬柴堆一样炽热。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The grey-haired servant's eyes burn with vicious indignation, like an executioner's pyre lit by a fanatic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那位灰发仆人的双眼中燃烧着恶毒的愤恨，仿佛狂热分子点燃的火葬柴堆一样炽热。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Los ojos del canoso sirviente arden con indignación, como la pira de un verdugo prendida por un fanático.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The grey-haired servant's eyes burn with vicious indignation, like an executioner's pyre lit by a fanatic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos del canoso sirviente arden con indignación, como la pira de un verdugo prendida por un fanático.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}白髪の従者の瞳が危うい怒りに燃えている。狂信者が火を点けた火刑の薪のようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The grey-haired servant's eyes burn with vicious indignation, like an executioner's pyre lit by a fanatic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}白髪の従者の瞳が危うい怒りに燃えている。狂信者が火を点けた火刑の薪のようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Une lueur d'indignation farouche brille dans les yeux du serviteur aux cheveux gris, comme les flammes d'un bûcher allumé par un fanatique.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The grey-haired servant's eyes burn with vicious indignation, like an executioner's pyre lit by a fanatic.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des grauhaarigen Dieners brennen vor Entrüstung, wie ein von einem Fanatiker angezündeter Scheiterhaufen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Boz saçlı hizmetkârın gözleri, harlı bir öfke duygusuyla yanıyor. Öyle harlı ki sanki hiç sönmeyecek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The grey-haired servant's eyes burn with vicious indignation, like an executioner's pyre lit by a fanatic.{/n}
